general_info.summary: This text provides an overview of Amity University's offerings, including regular courses in Computer Science/IT, specific programs like Biotechnology and Forensic Science, and details about admission prospectuses for various campuses (Noida, Patna, Ranchi, Mohali, Gurugram) for 2025. It also mentions Amity Scholarship, withdrawal guidelines, international campuses in Dubai and London, global business schools, and resources for online counseling and admissions. The document indicates that all rights are reserved by Amity University for 2018 and notes the website was designed by Sterco Digitex.
